notes.title: Optimized performance for arm64-v8a devices
notes.description: Enhanced code completion speed and accuracy on arm64-v8a Android devices.

notes.title: Reduced RAM footprint with shared process architecture
notes.description: Implemented a single shared process, significantly reducing memory usage on Android devices.

notes.title: Improved support for Android-specific languages
notes.description: Enhanced completions for Kotlin, Java, and XML files in Android projects.

notes.title: Optimized for latest Android SDKs
notes.description: Updated compatibility with the latest Android SDK versions for improved performance and stability.

notes.title: Battery optimization for mobile devices
notes.description: Implemented intelligent power management to reduce battery consumption during code completion tasks.
